Notes.Text:
This update for php5 fixes the following issues:

Security vulnerability fixed:

- CVE-2019-6977: Fixed a heap buffer overflow in gdImageColorMatch in
  gd_color_match.c (bsc#1123354)
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).

Vulnerabilities.Description: gdImageColorMatch in gd_color_match.c in the GD Graphics Library (aka LibGD) 2.2.5, as used in the imagecolormatch function in PHP before 5.6.40, 7.x before 7.1.26, 7.2.x before 7.2.14, and 7.3.x before 7.3.1, has a heap-based buffer overflow. This can be exploited by an attacker who is able to trigger imagecolormatch calls with crafted image data.
